Title: Requires damages for tortious acts of police officers to be paid from money in such police officer's retirement account
Summary: Requires damages for tortious acts of police officers to be paid from money in such police officer's retirement account; prohibits withdrawals from retirement accounts when there is a judgment against such officer except to pay for damages.
LawCode: Amd §50-j, Gen Muni L; add §§7-213 & 13-638.7, NYC Ad Cd; add §235, Exec L; add §20-b, Ct Claims Act; amd §351, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, the administrative code of the city of New York, the executive law, the court of claims act, and the retirement and social security law, in relation to requiring damages for tortious acts of police officers to be paid from money in such police officer's retirement account
